author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...ISAAC STILL A HURRICANE... ...LARGE AREA OF DANGEROUS HIGH SEAS SPREADING SEVERAL HUNDRED MILES FROM ISAAC'S CENTER...
summary:
...ISAAC STILL A HURRICANE... ...LARGE AREA OF DANGEROUS HIGH SEAS SPREADING SEVERAL HUNDRED MILES FROM ISAAC'S CENTER...
 As of 9:00 AM GMT Sun Sep 29
 the center of Isaac was located near 42.6, -36.5
 with movement NE at 13 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 969 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.
